attributes.additional_details: The range and quality of programmes that the channel delivers is unlikely to continue under private ownership.  Margaret Thatcher’s vision of a publicly owned channel funded by advertising should be respected.
attributes.background: Withdraw the legislation which seeks to sell the channel to a private organisation

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop the privatisation of Channel 4
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
